appName.description: The title of the application, displayed in the web store.

appDesc.description: The description of the application, displayed in the web store.

buttonStart.description: Button text to Start scroll, displayed in popup.

buttonPause.description: Button text to Stop scroll, displayed in popup.

buttonOptions.description: Title text to the options button, displayed in popup.

buttonToSave.description: Button text to Save options, displayed in options page.

buttonSaved.description: Button text to Saved options, displayed in options page.

buttonToReset.description: Button text to Reset options, displayed in options page.

buttonReset.description: Button text to Reseted options, displayed in options page.

labelDelayScroll.message: Delay time to scroll between the columns.

labelAnimateTime.description: Label text to defile the transition time between the colums.

labelScrollSteps.message: Scroll to the beginning in steps.
